definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: The feminist agenda is not about equal rights for women.
sentences.chinese: 女權主義運動根本無關爲女性爭取平等權利。

sentences.english: Radical feminism is currently the fashionable topic among the chattering classes.
sentences.chinese: 激進的女權主義是時下名嘴階層熱議的話題。

sentences.english: This diesis discusses that woman literature of Chang Xues world.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述了殘雪創作中的女權主義思想。

sentences.english: Who was the leader of feminism?
sentences.chinese: 誰是女權主義的領導人？

sentences.english: What are the conceptual differences between Chinese and Western feminism?
sentences.chinese: 中國與西方的女權主義在概念上有什麼不同？

sentences.english: In feminism he found an "amazonian" element.
sentences.chinese: 在女權主義，他找到了一位“亞馬孫”自供狀。

sentences.english: Feminists set out to prove men have negative views of women.
sentences.chinese: 女權主義認爲這篇報道證明了男人對女人產生偏見。

sentences.english: French women believe in feminism, but not at the price of femininity.
sentences.chinese: 法國婦女信奉女權主義，但決不以嬌柔作代價。

sentences.english: In postfeminist America, men are happier than women.
sentences.chinese: 在後女權主義的美國，男性比女性更幸福。

sentences.english: One reason that really struck me was radical feminism.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個讓我印象深刻的原因是激進的女權主義。

sentences.english: Feminism is not just about women.
sentences.chinese: 女權主義不僅僅是關於女性。

sentences.english: But his aphorism is about as good a one-sentence summary of classical feminism as you can get.
sentences.chinese: 他的這句名言是傳統女權主義的絕佳總結。

sentences.english: I'm reading a book about feminism .
sentences.chinese: 我在讀關於女權主義的書。

sentences.english: In China, feminism is really misunderstood.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，女權主義確實被誤解了。

sentences.english: But my recent research has shown me that feminism has become an unpopular word.
sentences.chinese: 現，女權主義已經成爲一個不受歡迎的詞。

sentences.english: But who cares what the feminists say anyhow?
sentences.chinese: 但是誰在乎女權主義說了什麼？
